data.text:
MindScape reWire program are workshops designed for smaller groups of up to 20 participants and are aimed at addressing mental well-being among teams, with an emphasis on burnout prevention. Workshops are thematically focused and intended for selected target groups according to the topics. The purpose of these workshops is to educate and offer a hands-on experience to participants, who can – through the experience of group hypnosis, CBT and NLP – learn to manage their minds and utilize a set of unique techniques that support them in improving their private and business lives.

Applied hypnosis workshops are practical workshops where we do not dive too deeply into theory, but rather focus on those practices and techniques that help us address individual challenges and tackle the goals we want to achieve. In addition to hypnosis and hypnotherapy, participants have he opportunity to familiarize themselves with a variety of scientific and holistic practices, such as neurolinguistic programming (NLP), breathing techniques and mindfulness practices. These are important elements that complement each other in a wholesome way and bring exceptional results in solving specific issues we wish to work on. In addition, participants gain new knowledge with which they can continue on the path towards reaching their goals and desires.

Are you looking to improve the overall mental well-being of your employees, prevent burnout, and create a healthier work environment characterized by joy, calmness, focus, and motivation?

Would you like to equip your employees with strategies to manage stress effectively and cultivate better connections among colleagues?

Then, the MindScape reWire trainings are the perfect solution for you. Prioritizing employee mental health is paramount for every successful organization, recognizing that a healthy mind is the foundation of a healthy life.

Workshop trainings for teams accommodate a limited number of participants, they are best suited for smaller groups (up to 20) from individual organization departments.

These workshops are ideal for addressing specific issues tailored to each group of employees, including:

Coping with stress and anxiety

Enhancing workplace productivity and motivation

Boosting sales performance (for sales teams)

Strengthening relationships with oneself and colleagues

Improving public speaking and negotiation skills (for senior management, leaders, sales teams, marketing & PR).

I offer lectures for companies, schools and organizations that want to offer their members quality content in the field of personal development and psychology. Interactive lectures are intended for a larger number of participants, who want to learn about the workings of the mind and the incredible power of our subconscious in a dynamic and personal way.

Rather than just focusing on theoretical explanations of the functioning of the mind and our psychological structures, these lectures offer practical techniques that have the power to improve our sense of well-being in an effective and immediate way, and offer a deeper understanding of ourselves and our surroundings. Participants learn about the important foundations of the workings of the mind, which is crucial for improving our sense of well-being and behaviour.

Participants will get acquainted with useful techniques from the field of hypnosis, neurolinguistic programming (NLP) and psychology. These lectures can be thematically adapted to the wishes and goals of the organization and the target group for which they are intended.
